document.full_text: the california man accused of abducting 11-year-old jaycee dugard in 1991 and holding her captive for 18 years will plead guilty this week, a lawyer for his wife and co-defendant said on monday.
document.title: jaycee dugard's accused kidnapper set for plea: lawyer
lines_and_colors: the california man accused of abducting 11-year-old jaycee dugard in 1991 and holding her captive for 18 years will plead guilty this week, a lawyer for his wife and co-defendant said on monday.
